metadata.title: CVE-2017-9120 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
PHP 7.x through 7.1.5 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service(buffer overflow and application crash) or possibly have unspecified otherimpact via a long string because of an Integer overflow inmysqli_real_escape_string.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-9120` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libapache2-mod-php7.2 - 7.2.24-0ubuntu0.18.04.11
libphp7.2-embed - 7.2.24-0ubuntu0.18.04.11
php7.2 - 7.2.24-0ubuntu0.18.04.11

criterions.comment: php7.2 package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '7.2.24-0ubuntu0.18.04.11').
